Please note that I will reject connection requests from people I've never met
personally.

status.full_text: I'll be @agilecologne Su+Mo. Talk to me about #remote, #futureofwork and the #RH_Way (the foundation for #agile in organizations).
@bommeljogi Oje. Aber bescheid wei√ü er schon? Gerade bei Altbau kann Wasser viel Schaden anrichten und da muss man schnell handeln!
@bommeljogi Ich wei√ü das aus eigener Erfahrung. Aktuell sind bei uns zwei Wohnungen leer, wegen einem "kleinen" Wasserschaden im Bad.
Your #redis can now learn things: https://t.co/IMYOTfITTz
My butcher relaunched his corporate identity: https://t.co/rVxKesyLcv
On my way to #agilecologne by ICE220. #dbl
Arriving in #Cologne: "Seien Sie schlauer als der Klauer." (Be smarter than the pickpocket.)

@airbone42 for the @agilecologne.
A two-day marathon ;-)
I don't know anybody here (besides the sponsors). Great potential for new ideas and inspiration! #agilecologne
#agilecologne is all German.

@ehrenb3rg @ingostoll Right. But the original would be hard to glance in Twitter's image format.

When organizations change, what to do with middle management? #agilecologne https://t.co/pUO4MKuSwt
Collected a lot of input about what's hindering #agile transformations. Tomorrow I'll show some solutions. #agilecologne #rh_way https://t.co/qxn0lcpsds

OH: WLAN = Verbundenheit
#agilecologne

@simonklaiber Du meinst, dass sie sich nicht dahin ver√§ndern werden?
@simonklaiber ich hoffe das die meisten gerne die Chance nutzen, ihren Kollegen zu helfen und sich zu ver√§ndern. Sie haben viele M√∂gl.
@simonklaiber aber sicherlich ist es keine leichte Aufgabe, viele Jahre gelerntes zu ver√§ndern. Unternehmen k√∂nnen weder jeden feuern,
@simonklaiber der blockt, noch den Status Quo deswegen beibehalten.
No sunshine, but great morning @motelone #cologne. https://t.co/ftAgd1BNZA

"Help me: my organization will never be agile!"
Wrong! We @RH_Way have fixes for most of the problems I've heard at #agilecologne! https://t.co/1j3g2SCoPV
.@ardalanai wir visualisieren genau das mit @getstaRHs: https://t.co/e7pWfrLZMJ
@ardalanai Die Erkenntnis ist oft, dass Manager nicht in der Mitte sind, und wichtige Mitarbeiter keine hohe Position haben.
Surfing via the French train on the next track, because their Wifi works and is free. #ice201 https://t.co/uThtCa5VCg
@ardalanai Silos sind real. "Oh, wir dachten nicht dass die SO wenig miteinander sprechen."
@ardalanai Oft aber auch, das bestimmte Abteilung keinen Sinn haben.
@db_bahn Wagen 26, btw. Keine IP-Vergabe via WIFIonICE.

I want to make fun about the stereotype how the parents in #cologne name their children.
But that's just nasty.
Still funny, though.

@rradczewski Nice. The project() is cool and easy to read.
But how to I aggregate a specific user?

@rradczewski that gets messy, if you add more conditions. E.g. IsUserActiveAndHasPostedWithinTime.
So the question is whether to allow
@rradczewski filtering within the projection or move that to a read model you derive from all events.
@rradczewski which is a good use case for generators.
@rradczewski Yes, I'll try to provide an example. But would you agree that Querying is outside of the scope?

@wellendonner yes, started today and I'm very impressed. The last days I've spent driving into NativeScript and that's was horrible.
@FrauMamonova the Motorolas are good. What are your needs?
@wellendonner deploy to Android and iOS with live sync without local SDKs of an app with navigation, menu, forms, buttons, push notification
@FrauMamonova none of the latest devices has a 4 inch screen. Simply does not make sense for high specs. No way around 5+ inches.
@wellendonner yes!
